Title: Le Bal
Writer: Jean-Claude Penchenat (scenario), Ruggero Maccari (scenario), Furio Scarpelli (scenario), Ettore Scola (scenario), Jean-Claude Penchenat (idea)
Actors: Étienne Guichard, Régis Bouquet, Francesco De Rosa, Arnault LeCarpentier
Plot: The 50 year story of a ballroom in France, from the 1920s. The people who go there is always the same, even the musicians. You can see all kind of people dancing all the fashion dances (depending on the age).
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 4 nominations.
